abstract: Louisiana Gov Bobby Jindal's administration says state ran deficit in past budgetary year but declines to give size of shortfall; administration is expected to share details with state Legislature's budget committee in mid-October.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Bobby Jindal’s administration is notifying legislative leaders that Louisiana closed the books on the budget year that ended June 30 with a deficit.

headline.main: Louisiana: Budget in Red, but Amount Is Undisclosed
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Budget in Red, but Amount Is Undisclosed

snippet: Gov. Bobby Jindal’s administration is notifying legislative leaders that Louisiana closed the books on the budget year that ended June 30 with a deficit.
